location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to Government at Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing two letters regarding the inferior quality of sulphur received from Bushire as well as a sample of the said sulphur. The letters are:Edward Wood, Secretary to Government, to James Farish, dated 15 March 1816Robert Bell, Thomas Henry Somerset [T H S] Conway and Valentine Blacker to Hugh Elliot, Governor in Council, dated 12 December 1815
